creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund; purchase from the collection of Elizabeth and Willard Clark
description: unsigned; 6 panel screens with various scenes divided by gold clouds; at R, men and women are gathered in a room with two female musicians; at LR, a man on a verandah gazes inside at a kneeling woman; other groups of men around outside; other vignettes of people gathered outside, near carriages, or inside rooms with verandahs
medium: Ink, color, and silver on gold
object_name: Six-panel folding screen, one of a pair (left)
title: Scenes from the Tale of Genji
